Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Thalidomide blocks the activity of angiogenic agents including bFGF , VEGF and IL - 6 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| bFGF (basic Fibroblast Growth Factor) |
| VEGF (Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor) |
| IL-6 (Interleukin-6) |

Thalidomide inhibits the function of bFGF, VEGF, and IL-6, which are angiogenic agents.
